ygData.subject: New job in Heritrix - previous job's memory is not freed
ygData.msgSnippet: Folks, When a job finishes in Heritrix (using a certain amount of memory to complete), and new job is started, the domain-based structures do not seem to be

Subject: New job in Heritrix - previous job's memory is not freed
X-Yahoo-Group-Post: member; u=225011788; y=w1aWdYqOIFc_h5a1WzSosKY1Me4it3MWwuegXocuEp2WbXM
X-Yahoo-Profile: daddywri

Folks,

When a job finishes in Heritrix (using a certain amount of memory to 
complete), and new job is started, the domain-based structures do not 
seem to be cleared out, so running out of memory on the new job occurs 
quite readily (especially since we had to break our seed list into 
multiple jobs in the first place to avoid running out of memory).  I can 
surmise how this behavior might come about - but was this changed in 
1.8?  We are currently using 1.5 here.

Thanks,
Karl
